name: Bounty Rush
description:
You found a treasure chest full of gold and gems, but it is located deep underground and surrounded by danger.

To get to it you need to cross a lava pit while avoiding the erupting lava.

The path is very unstable so you can only carry one treasure at a time, also, be aware of a nasty bat, he will try to trow you into the lava.

See how many treasures you can collect and try to reach the top of the rankings.

CONTROLS
LEFT / RIGHT or A / D: To move

This game is a submission to the VimJam, I created the game engine for this jam and made all the programming. Most of the assets are also created by me with the exception of a couple of sprite sheets that have been correctly credited in the in-game credits menu.
